tool_description:
Access Vinted public data with our Scraper API for comprehensive product information retrieval such as Search Results, Reviews, Product information and Seller Data.

Supports: 
vinted.fr, vinted.be, vinted.es, vinted.lu, vinted.nl, vinted.lt, vinted.de, vinted.at, vinted.it, vinted.co.uk, vinted.pt, vinted.com, vinted.cz, vinted.sk, vinted.pl, vinted.se, vinted.ro, vinted.hu, vinted.dk
name: Vinted
title: Vinted

api_list.name: Search Results
api_list.description: Need more data from the same source or other sources? [Contact Us](https://tally.so/r/mVzr7j)

required_parameters.name: order
required_parameters.description: Sort by: relevance, price_high_to_low, price_low_to_high, newest_first.

required_parameters.name: page
required_parameters.description: Must be 1 or more, Less than 32.

optional_parameters.name: materials
optional_parameters.description:
Format: materiald,materiald,materialId...
Can be obtained through **Materials** endpoint.

optional_parameters.name: conditions
optional_parameters.description:
Format: conditionId,conditionId,conditionId...
Can be obtained through **Conditions** endpoint.

optional_parameters.name: colors
optional_parameters.description:
Format: colorId,colorId,colorId...
Can be obtained through **Colors** endpoint.

optional_parameters.name: brands
optional_parameters.description:
Format: brandId,brandId,brandId...
Can be obtained through **Brand Search** endpoint.

optional_parameters.name: category
optional_parameters.description: Can be obtained through the **Categories** endpoint

api_list.name: Materials
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://vinted3.p.rapidapi.com/materials"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "vinted3.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

required_parameters.description: Can be obtained through **Search Results and Product Information** endpoints.
